title: Google AI Overview made up an elaborate story about me
author: jsheard
aiHeadline: Google AI's wild imagination runs rampant, invents a fictional life story about a random person, because apparently, making up stories about you is now its new hobby.

title: Bear is now source-available
author: neoromantique
aiHeadline: Bear finally takes off its clothes, becomes source-available, proving that even software can embrace transparency and let the world see its naked code.

title: Cloudflare Radar: AI Insights
author: tosh
aiHeadline: Cloudflare Radar reveals AI insights, probably because they're too busy trying to predict the future while the rest of us are just trying to figure out how to pay our bills.

title: CocoaPods trunk read-only plan
author: matharmin
aiHeadline: CocoaPods trunk goes read-only, because who needs to actually contribute when you can just sit back and watch the chaos unfold, right?

title: The time picker on the iPhone's alarm app isn't circular, it's just a long list
author: oidar
aiHeadline: iPhone alarm app's time picker isn't circular? Who knew a list could be so revolutionary, or maybe Apple just ran out of circular designs and had to resort to the basics.
